ScorecardMetric.name: ScorecardMetric
ScorecardMetric.description: Stores information about a Salesforce report that is run and summarized to get a single value. The stored value is added as a metric to the related Scorecard object.

Category.description: Groups metrics together. It comes with a predefined set of dropdown list entries and can be extended to address vendorâ€™s needs each category is user-generated and can be localized through translation workbench.

Description.description: The description of the metric that appears on a scorecard.

Name.description: The name of the metric that appears on a scorecard.

ReportId.description: The ID of the report that is run and summarized to return a single value.

ScorecardId.description: The ID of the scorecard that the metric is related to. Several metrics can be tied to a single scorecard.
